element.name: Extended Vision Module
element.description: This device lets you see better. While wearing it, your vision range doubles, and you have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight. (Weight: 1)

element.name: Clock-Compass
element.description: This item always shows you the exact time and which way is north. (Weight: 0)

element.name: Sound Amplifier
element.description: This device helps you hear better. You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing. Alternatively, you can use it to amplify your voice so it can be heard twice as far. (Weight: 1).

element.name: Foldable Glider
element.description: This item allows you to slow your fall and move forward. For every 5 feet you fall, you can move forward up to 5 feet reducing this distance from the fall, as long as you have enough space. If you canâ€™t move forward you take the remaining damage as normal. (Weight: 4)

element.name: Mechanical Thrower
element.description: This item lets you throw a weapon or improvised weapon 10 feet farther than normal. (Weight: 1)

element.name: Automatic Reloader
element.description: This item lets you ignore the loading property of a ranged weapon you are wielding twice, recovering its uses on a short rest. (Weight: 2)

element.name: Jumper
element.description: This gadget allows you to make extraordinary leaps. While wearing it, your jump range doubles, and you have advantage on Strength (Athletics) checks related to jumping. (Weight: 1)

element.name: Climber
element.description: This item allows you to climb easily. While wearing it, climbing does not cost you extra movement, and you have advantage on Strength (Athletics) checks related to climbing. (Weight: 1)

element.name: Carrying Frame
element.description: This set of springs and gears helps you carry more weight. While wearing it, you are considered to have +3 to your Strength ability score for the purposes of calculating load and lifting weight, as well as for the Strength requirements of armor. (Weight: 3)

element.name: Potion Injector
element.description: This contraption allows you to load a potion into a mounted reservoir at the end of a long rest. As a bonus action, you can inject the loaded potion directly into your bloodstream and receive its effects. (Weight: 2)
